products.name: Onions
products.description: Onions are known to be rich in biotin. Most of the flavonoids which are known as anti-oxidants are concentrated more in the outer layers, so when you peel off the layers, you should remove as little as possible

products.name: Carrots
products.description: A popular sweet-tasting root vegetable, Carrots are narrow and cone shaped

products.name: Apples
products.description: Our apple is a round fruit with red or green skin and a whitish inside. This variety of apple might be sweet and sour.

products.name: Grapes
products.description: Grapes are fleshy, rounded fruits that grow in clusters made up of many fruits of greenish, yellowish or purple skin.
